subject: Is it possible to write tesMethods for only the calling class..?
msgSnippet: I ve 3 class A,B and C. The class A calls B which inturn calls C. Is it possible to write the testMethods for only the methods of class A.
messageBody:
I've 3 class A,B and C. The class A calls B which inturn calls C. Is
it possible to write the testMethods for only the methods of class A.
